attributes.action: Turn all parent and child parking spaces in all car parks to disabled spaces.
attributes.additional_details: It would be more beneficial to disabled drivers if parent and child parking spaces were moved to the far end of a carpark as there would be more disabled parking closer to shops.
attributes.background: Move all parent and child parking to the far end of a carpark to make room for more disabled parking.

rejection.details: Decisions about the location of parking spaces within car parks is a matter for the landowner, not the UK Government or Parliament.
